name: Black Coffee
desc: A coffee drink made with espresso, chocolate, steamed milk, and topped with whipped cream.

name: Cappuccino
desc: A coffee drink that is composed of double espresso and equal parts of steamed milk and milk foam.

name: Latte
desc: A coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk, topped with a small amount of milk foam.

name: Espresso
desc: A concentrated form of coffee brewed by forcing pressurized hot water through finely ground coffee beans.

name: Mocha
desc: A coffee drink made with espresso, chocolate, steamed milk, and topped with whipped cream.

name: Americano
desc: A diluted form of espresso made by adding hot water to it.

name: Turkish Coffee
desc: A traditional method of preparing coffee by boiling finely powdered coffee beans in a pot.

name: Iced Coffee
desc: A coffee drink served over ice, often with added milk, sugar, or flavorings.

name: Decaf Coffee
desc: Coffee that has had most or all of its caffeine removed.
